the weed was good and the guy behind the counter very helpful and friendly.

Name: Coffeeshop ‚Äòt Ooievaartje

Name: Coffeeshop ‚Äòt Ooievaartje
Review Text: As a coffee lover, I won't settle for gimmicks and false advertisement. So I make sure to experience a coffee shop myself to decide on whether they are good or bad. For me, this one has my vote. Great coffees, great staffs.
